metadata.name: Chaos
metadata.description:
Chaos for you doesn’t necessarily mean the same for others, whether it’s in your home, life or relationship. Chaos can be overwhelming but also utterly beautiful if we try not to control it too much. 
Glaciers are chaotic in many ways, they are structured chaos. Glacier are formed and shaped the way they are for a reason and they are disappearing for a reason. 
When we watch the glacier, the chaos can feel unstructured and hard to understand, but every little detail has its own reason and story. 
Little snowflake that landed on Iceland largest glacier, that flake is now part of one of Iceland largest outlet glacier. Breiðamerkurjökull, soon to be a water molecule in Jökulsárlón and then the Atlantic Ocean. 
Talk about chaotic life to live. 
The beauty of the chaos is real.

Artist: Guillaume Martin Kollibay

Title: Chaos

Location: Breiðamerkurjökull, Iceland

Size: 2912x3640

Genre: Aerial photography 

Time of creation: November 2019

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creator.
